content.text:
# Draft:List of transport accidents and incidents in the United Kingdom

This list records transport-related accidents and incidents in the United Kingdom, sorted by mode. Events are only listed if they fit criteria relating to casualty counts, specific to each type. Indirect incidents such as fires or terrorist attacks are also included.
Aviation
Accidents and incidents involving aviation with at least five deaths or 25 injuries are listed.
{| class="wikitable sortable"
!Date
!Location
!Dead
!Injured
!Total
!Description
|-
|
|
|
|
|
|
|}
